show.title: Billionaire Daddy, the Hunt is On!
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://kukufm.com/show/billionaire-daddy-the-hunt-is-on-1/?utm_source=share_sh
show.description: Miranda, a dedicated single mother, works hard to support her son, but constantly clashes with her cold, distant boss, Lemon. Little does she know, he’s actually the boy’s biological father—and beneath his tough exterior, he’s hiding a warm heart.
show.description_secondary: Miranda, a dedicated single mother, works hard to support her son, but constantly clashes with her cold, distant boss, Lemon. Little does she know, he’s actually the boy’s biological father—and beneath his tough exterior, he’s hiding a warm heart.
